name: My name
description:
This is the story of the memory of a fusion organism's nucleotide sequence.

This is a full voice novel game.

Estimated play time: 1 minute

#This is an entry in the 3rd One Minute Novel Contest.

A full-voiced silly game.

Creator

Kobayashi-sensei

Update history

2021/09/01 Start of release

2021/09/06 ver.2.00

Voice is implemented.

Introduction

This game is a short novel game created by yranobuilder.

This is the first game I made with yranobuilder.

This is the first game I've made with yranobuilder, so please understand that it may be a bit confusing.

You can start the game with hage.exe.

If you have any questions about the game, please feel free to contact me.

You don't have to contact me, but I'd appreciate it if you did.

I'll be happy to check it out.

Planning and production by Prof. Kobayashi

Image: Kobayashi-sensei

Voice actors: Kobayashi-sensei

ボイスを実装

◆はじめに

このゲームはtyranobuilderによって制作した短編ノベルゲームです。

yranobuilderで初めて作った作品ですので

不可解な部分もあると思いますがご了承くださいませ。

hage.exeでゲームを始められます。

ゲーム実況，ゲーム紹介を積極的に歓迎します。

連絡は無くてもよいですが，連絡頂けるとありがたいです。

積極的に見に行きます。
